sentences.sentence: It looks like a friendly small village
I can maybe rest here, check is there something useful
You attack and loop all the houses and people in the village.
You find all kind of items. Yay
You spend the rest of the day looking for more things
You decided to attack the village
What do you think you are doing?!
An old man beats your ass
You were thrown out of the village...
You notice that the village may have an object of your interest.
After looking around and asking some question you manage to obtain an item.
You sleep in a small comfortable inn...
You spend all they day trying to look for something useful
